this classic style leaves room for so many options - add bear ears page 12 - add a fur or yarn pom pom - or two for a different kind of bear look - pattern is written with shorter ties that are best tied with a loose knot under the chin because of their thickness you might consider adding braided ties instead if you prefer tying a bow under the neck - combine several strands of lighter weight yarn in the same or different colors check gauge - change colors every row or two for a striped bonnet - single_crochet single_crochet through the back loop only blo on the last row across the front for a different finish as pictured on the cover boyd pixie bonnet pattern -
